thread.title: Jasen
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Jasen

author: Jasen
title: Jasen
text:
Picked up a 2014 Red Bianchi Intenso online. Graeme (web manager) was a big help. The bike arrived with a small scratch in frame. Graeme turned the experience into a positive by offering me compensation for the scratch that was more than fair.
other notes:
- Shipping of the bike was quick it only took just a week to receive it.
- I looked everywhere to find this bike and only Erik's had it in stock.
- Web service is amazing.. ask a question and it is answered that day.
- Lots of knowledge on all the products sold.
Yes, I will buy again from Erik's Online again!
